template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a {physical_system} that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an operational optimization task for a HVAC building system that includes analyzing live data, adjusting parameters within safety constraints, monitoring results, and reporting performance improvements; output only the prompt text under 40 words.

message.content: Optimize HVAC performance using live data by adjusting parameters within safety limits while monitoring and reporting improvements.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a single-sentence prompt under 40 words for an HVAC optimization task. The task needs to cover live data analysis, parameter adjustment within safety limits, result monitoring, and performance reporting.

Let me break this down: live data analysis means real-time input, adjusting parameters implies dynamic control, safety constraints are a must, monitoring ensures feedback loops, and reporting ties it all together. 

I can combine these elements concisely by focusing on the core action ("optimize") followed by the key components. "Optimize HVAC performance using live data" covers the analysis part, "by adjusting parameters within safety limits" addresses the constraint, and "while monitoring and reporting improvements" wraps up the monitoring and reporting aspects.

That should fit within the word limit while hitting all the required points.
